ygData.subject: trading the stein comments
ygData.msgSnippet: the elf hide gloves are a joke, my buddy been camping the warden on sol ro for a couple nights for a belt and has gotten 0 belts so far and about a dozen sets
ygData.messageBody:
the elf hide gloves are a joke, my buddy been camping the warden on sol ro
for a couple nights for a belt and has gotten 0 belts so far and about a
dozen sets of gloves, which he then proceeds to give to newbie bards/rogues
most of the time. of all the nights he camped him he's killed well over 15
wardens. try to get a claw or a belt (good luck).

Minkin Nehoc
Solusek Ro
Bard of the 30th Chorus

> -----Original Message-----
> From: RON_TALBOT@...
> [SMTP:RON_TALBOT@...]
> Sent: August 18, 1999 1:32 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Trade In
>
> From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
> OK,
>
> After two days of errand running, escort duty and chores (my bud
>
> is a 25th level enchanter and she has run the quest eight times now.)
>
> I am now the proud owner of a glowing stein. Why you say? Your a
> bard silly and you can't even drink out of it... anyway I hoping to
>
> trade this baby in for something good before the value drops any
> more.
> (I wish V would disable the quest like the rumors claim then the
> value
> would skyrocket)
> What do you think I can get for a Glowing stein? Thulian claws?
>
> Writhing staff, Elfhide (shudder) gloves, trollhide belt? What would
>
> you suggest? Specifically which zone should I go to, to trade for
> the
> claws? Suggestions and rude comments welcome. :)
>
> Bujold 19th level
> Xegony
>
>
